channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Emptoris Strategic Supply Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Emptoris Strategic Supply Management

item.title: CVE-2017-1190|2024-08-05T13:25:17.377Z -- ibm -- emptoris%20strategic%20supply%20management
item.description: IBM Emptoris Strategic Supply Management Platform 10.x and 10.1 could allow a local user with special access roles to execute arbitrary code on the system. By manipulating a configurable property, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain full control over the system. IBM X-Force ID: 123559.

item.title: CVE-2017-1097|2024-08-05T13:25:17.247Z -- ibm -- emptoris%20strategic%20supply%20management
item.description: IBM Emptoris Strategic Supply Management Platform 10.0.0.x through 10.1.1.x is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 120657.
